name: true-floats
description: Shows the underlying IEEE-754 double precision value (full precision & hex) for floating point literals inline in many languages.

trueFloats.enabled.description: Enable inline true float value annotations.

trueFloats.onlyWhenDifferent.description: Only annotate when the literal's canonical full-precision decimal differs from the source token (e.g. 0.1 -> 0.10000000000000001).

trueFloats.decimalPrecision.description: Number of significant digits to display for the true decimal value (max 25).

trueFloats.fontSizeDelta.description: Relative font size change for annotation (negative to make smaller).

trueFloats.compactRepeats.description: Compact long trailing runs of the same digit (e.g. 0.29999999999999999 -> 0.2…9×14).

trueFloats.compactRepeatMinRun.description: Minimum run length of a single repeated trailing digit required to compact.
